attributes.action: Bring back mathematical rigor into secondary physics education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the government to return the teaching of secondary physics to the rigorous subject that it should be.  Students should learn methods to mathematically describe the physical world rather than answer word questions that rely on opinion and non-scientific ideas.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Bring back mathematical rigor into secondary physics education."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
